committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to modify the computation for part-time service under the Civil Service Retirement System.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Requires part-time service performed by a federal employee before April 7, 1986, to be credited as full-time service for purposes of annuity computation under the Civil Service Retirement System (currently, the annuity benefit for such part-time service is prorated).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to modify the computation for part-time service under the Civil Service Retirement System.
